info.description: API Server for CashBook Personal Finance Manager. This API handles transactions, budgeting, category management, and financial reporting.
info.title: CashBook - Personal Finance API

post.description: Generate 10 one-time backup codes for account recovery.
Use a one-time backup code to complete 2FA login.

delete.description: Turn off two-factor authentication for the current user.

post.description: Generate TOTP secret and QR code for the authenticated user.
Validate the initial TOTP code to enable 2FA.
Validate TOTP code with temporary token to complete login.

get.description: Retrieve the current system-wide MFA enforcement policy.
Handles the redirection from Google after user authorization, exchanges code for token, and authenticates user.
Redirects the client to Google's OAuth2 authorization page to begin the authentication process.

307.description: Temporary Redirect to Google Auth URL

get.description: Retrieve monthly budget targets and current spending progress for a specific period to maintain financial discipline.

post.description: Set or update a monthly spending limit for a specific financial category.

get.description: Retrieve all personalized spending and income categories available for the user.

post.description: Define a new classification category with custom styling (color/icon) for transaction organization.

put.description: Update the properties of an existing category, such as name or visual identifiers.

delete.description: Permanently remove a transaction category from the user's profile.

post.description: Validate user credentials. If 2FA is enabled, returns a temporary token for 2FA verification.

get.description: Retrieve all active recurring transaction templates set up for automated financial tracking.

post.description: Define a new recurring transaction pattern to automate repetitive financial entries like bills or subscriptions.
Manually trigger the processing of due recurring templates to generate actual financial transactions for the current period.

delete.description: Permanently remove a recurring transaction pattern from the automation schedule.

get.description: Generate a detailed breakdown of expenses categorized for a specific period to identify spending patterns.
Retrieve a detailed list of financial transactions with support for pagination and business filters like category, date range, and type (income/expense).

post.description: Log a new financial entry (income or expense) to track personal cash flow.

get.description: Calculate and retrieve the current total balance, aggregate income, and aggregate expenses for an immediate overview of financial status.

put.description: Update the details of an existing transaction to ensure ledger accuracy.

delete.description: Permanently delete a transaction from the personal finance history.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all registered users in the application.

post.description: Create a new user entry with assigned roles and initial status (Admin privileged).

get.description: Fetch comprehensive details of a specific user account by their unique identifier.

put.description: Modify existing user account details and preferences.

delete.description: Permanently remove a user identity and access from the system.

post.description: Administrative utility to securely reset a user's password following ISO security standards.
